医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
青少年的长期新冠病毒在两年内表现出显着改善伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，大多数在 PCR 检测呈阳性三个月后被确认患有长期新冠肺炎的年轻人都在 24 个月内康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Long-Covid-in-teenagers-shows-significant-improvement-within-two-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Long-Covid-in-teenagers-shows-significant-improvement-within-two-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3905ec4e-d926-4101-aa7f-22c40b04ff71 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 07:23:31 -0500 Long Covid in teenagers shows significant improvement within two years
癌症治疗可能会破坏动脉的免疫调节，从而增加心脏病和中风的风险免疫检查点抑制剂可能会通过改变动脉粥样硬化斑块中的免疫相互作用来增加心血管风险，特别是在糖尿病患者中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Cancer-therapy-may-raise-heart-attack-and-中风-risks-by-disrupting-immune-regulation-in-arteries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Cancer-therapy-may-raise-heart-attack-and-中风-risks-by-disrupting-immune-regulation-in-arteries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2896f8f4-eb2e-472a-8b99-f04c0c33467d Wed, 04 Dec 2024 07:06:00 -0500 Cancer therapy may raise heart attack and stroke risks by disrupting immune regulation in arteries
evitria 与 Sapio Sciences 合作简化抗体工作流程管理和报告science-aware™ 实验室信息学平台 Sapio Sciences 今天宣布，抗体表达服务领域的领导者 evitria 已选择 Sapio 的电子实验室笔记本 (ELN) 和 Sapio Report Builder 来增强其样本跟踪、数据捕获和报告功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/evitria-partners-with-Sapio-Sciences-to-streamline-antibody-workflow-management-and-reporting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/evitria-partners-with-Sapio-Sciences-to-streamline-antibody-workflow-management-and-reporting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8e3f82a-e208-4493-808f-a87bc3f30d43 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 06:45:00 -0500 evitria partners with Sapio Sciences to streamline antibody workflow management and reporting
evitria 与 Sapio Sciences 合作简化抗体工作流程管理和报告evitria 优化抗体表达服务，利用 Sapio 的 ELN 和报告生成器增强科学工作流程的数据捕获和报告能力， https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/evitria-Partners-with-Sapio-Sciences-to-Streamline-Antibody-Workflow-Management-and-Reporting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/evitria-Partners-with-Sapio-Sciences-to-Streamline-Antibody-Workflow-Management-and-Reporting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ad162f6-2429-47a3-86fe-a336f54e6dac Wed, 04 Dec 2024 06:19:00 -0500 evitria Partners with Sapio Sciences to Streamline Antibody Workflow Management and Reporting
研究表明超加工食品与肌内脂肪之间存在联系今天在北方放射学会年会上发表的一项研究表明，无论消耗的热量多少或体力活动水平如何，富含超加工食品的饮食都会导致大腿肌肉内储存更多的脂肪。美国（RSNA）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Study-shows-connection- Between-ultra-processed-foods-and-intramuscular-fat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Study-shows-connection- Between-ultra-processed-foods-and-intramuscular-fat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7e8235f-63f2-45d4-bd95-87d41ffbd661 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 05:53:06 -0500 Study shows connection between ultra-processed foods and intramuscular fat
墨西哥裔美国女性中风后不依从药物治疗的比例最高根据今天发表在开放获取的《美国心脏协会杂志》上的一项新研究，患有中风的女性可能比男性更不可能服用药物来预防第二次中风，其中墨西哥裔美国女性的不依从率最高。 ，美国心脏协会的同行评审期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Mexican-American-women-show-highest-rates-of-medication-nonadherence-after-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Mexican-American-women-show-highest-rates-of-medication-nonadherence-after-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7344a1f0-9100-4f86-9997-e41f063ce9ce Wed, 04 Dec 2024 05:50:27 -0500 Mexican American women show highest rates of medication nonadherence after stroke
跨性别女性比顺性别女性面临更多伤害一项新的研究发现，根据放射成像，跨性别女性的受伤率明显高于顺性别女性的受伤率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Transgender-women-face-significantly-more-injuries-than-cisgender-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Transgender-women-face-significantly-more-injuries-than-cisgender-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ce4530f-eff8-48d2-8a07-3084492f0bc6 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 05:38:15 -0500 Transgender women face significantly more injuries than cisgender women
探索间充质干细胞在癌症治疗中的潜力2024 年 11 月 22 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新评论，题为“间充质干细胞——癌症免疫疗法的秘密代理人：承诺、挑战和令人惊讶的曲折”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Exploring-the-pottial-of-MSCs-in-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Exploring-the-pottial-of-MSCs-in-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dd7dad0-e0b5-4dc7-bd2d-43f6e9297abb Wed, 04 Dec 2024 01:23:52 -0500 Exploring the potential of MSCs in cancer therapy
睡眠-觉醒节律紊乱与肝病进展有关由于肥胖和久坐生活方式的增加，MASLD（代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪肝病）的患病率在世界大多数地区呈爆炸式增长。 MASLD（以前称为非酒精性脂肪肝病）已经是最常见的肝脏疾病：它影响 30% 的成年人以及 7% 至 14% 的儿童和青少年，并且这一患病率预计将上升至 55% 以上到 2040 年，成年人数量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Disrupted-sleep-wake-rhythms-linked-to-liver-disease-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Disrupted-sleep-wake-rhythms-linked-to-liver-disease-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22882d33-4a52-4de7-8bb6-5104d7d51872 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 01:18:16 -0500 Disrupted sleep-wake rhythms linked to liver disease progression
美国人口普查数据揭示了空气污染相关癌症风险的社会经济驱动因素新的研究建立在对空气污染和癌症风险在美国各地如何分布的科学认识的基础上。空气污染通常由工业或车辆排放造成，可以传播数百英里，并通过更高的哮喘、呼吸道感染、中风和肺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/US-census-data-reveal-socioeconomic-drivers-of-air-pollution-lated-cancer-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/US-census-data-reveal-socioeconomic-drivers-of-air-pollution-lated-cancer-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21c5fd73-d5a8-47f9-ad06-7a091753eeb8 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 00:49:26 -0500 US census data reveal socioeconomic drivers of air pollution-related cancer risks
